CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c, "Onboarding Complete"), "Onboarding Complete",
IF( ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c, "Cancelled"), "Onboarding Cancelled",
Text( Today() - Start_Date_Of_Current_Step__c - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Start_Date_Of_Current_Step__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7)))))
CustomField.label: Days in Current Step
